title: Update Client KYC Information
description: A periodic review requires a client to update their KYC information, such as employment and source of funds.

tasks.description: Notify the client that a periodic KYC update is required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a secure message to the client requesting the updated information.

tasks.description: Collect the updated information from the client (e.g., new employer, annual income).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely receives and records the new client information.

tasks.description: Update the client's profile in the system with the new KYC data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the client's record.
